A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Nothing will ever replace the nostalgia of growing up with Episode 4\, 5 and 6. That said\, I have let all those presumptions go and settled into enjoy the new movies. They are fun\, I'm getting more into the new characters and I thoroughly enjoy myself. Not perfect\, but with a good crowd\, cheers\, claps and hollers\, it was fun. I recommend it and will continue to see more.
